languages.text: {n}Преподобный добродушно смеется.{/n} "Ваша правда: все знают, что духовному лицу надлежит строгостию вида внушать прихожанам страх да трепет". {n}Его веселье гаснет, уступая место задумчивой серьезности.{/n} "Истина в том, что я и мой клан пережили великие тягости. Иначе как волей Его я не могу объяснить то, что стою перед вами. Разве может человек не быть радостным, зная, что спасен Императором?"

{n}Adalbert laughs good-naturedly.{/n} "A fair observation. Everyone knows that the clergy must maintain a stern appearance to inspire fear and awe in their flock." {n}His mirth fades, giving way to a pensive gravitas.{/n} "The truth is that my clan and I experienced great hardship. I cannot explain how it is I am standing before you now except by His will. How could one be anything but joyful knowing they were saved by the Emperor?"
languages.original_text: {n}Преподобный добродушно смеется.{/n} "Ваша правда: все знают, что духовному лицу надлежит строгостию вида внушать прихожанам страх да трепет". {n}Его веселье гаснет, уступая место задумчивой серьезности.{/n} "Истина в том, что я и мой клан пережили великие тягости. Иначе как волей Его я не могу объяснить то, что стою перед вами. Разве может человек не быть радостным, зная, что спасен Императором?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The reverend laughs good-naturedly.{/n} "Fair enough. Everyone knows that the clergy must maintain a stern appearance that induces fear and trepidation in their flock." {n}His mirth fades, giving way to a pensive gravitas.{/n} "The truth is that my clan and I went through great hardship. Other than by it being His will, I cannot explain how I am standing before you now. Who can be anything but joyful knowing they were saved by the Emperor?"

Other than by it being His will, I cannot explain how I am standing before you now. Who can be anything but joyful knowing they were saved by the Emperor?"

languages.text: {n}Adalbert rit de bon cœur :{/n} « Une observation des plus justes. Tout le monde sait que le clergé doit faire figure austère pour inspirer la crainte et le respect à ses ouailles. » {n}Sa jovialité cède la place à un air grave et pensif.{/n} « Pour tout vous dire, mon clan et moi n'avons pas été épargnés par l'adversité. Si je me trouve devant vous aujourd'hui, c'est uniquement parce que l'Empereur l'a voulu. Qui ne serait pas enjoué en sachant qu'il a été sauvé par notre divin protecteur ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert laughs good-naturedly.{/n} "A fair observation. Everyone knows that the clergy must maintain a stern appearance to inspire fear and awe in their flock." {n}His mirth fades, giving way to a pensive gravitas.{/n} "The truth is that my clan and I experienced great hardship. I cannot explain how it is I am standing before you now except by His will. How could one be anything but joyful knowing they were saved by the Emperor?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert rit de bon cœur :{/n} « Une observation des plus justes. Tout le monde sait que le clergé doit faire figure austère pour inspirer la crainte et le respect à ses ouailles. » {n}Sa jovialité cède la place à un air grave et pensif.{/n} « Pour tout vous dire, mon clan et moi n'avons pas été épargnés par l'adversité. Si je me trouve devant vous aujourd'hui, c'est uniquement parce que l'Empereur l'a voulu. Qui ne serait pas enjoué en sachant qu'il a été sauvé par notre divin protecteur ? »

languages.text: {n}Adalbert profiere una bienintencionada carcajada.{/n} «No le falta razón. Todo el mundo sabe que el clero ha de mantenerse circunspecto para inspirar temor y respeto en su rebaño». {n}Su alegría da paso a una expresión pensativa.{/n} «Lo cierto es que mi clan y yo padecimos una gran penuria. No sabría explicar cómo es que sigo aquí, salvo por Su voluntad. ¿Cómo no iba a alegrarme saber que el mismo Emperador me salvó la vida?».
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert laughs good-naturedly.{/n} "A fair observation. Everyone knows that the clergy must maintain a stern appearance to inspire fear and awe in their flock." {n}His mirth fades, giving way to a pensive gravitas.{/n} "The truth is that my clan and I experienced great hardship. I cannot explain how it is I am standing before you now except by His will. How could one be anything but joyful knowing they were saved by the Emperor?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert profiere una bienintencionada carcajada.{/n} «No le falta razón. Todo el mundo sabe que el clero ha de mantenerse circunspecto para inspirar temor y respeto en su rebaño». {n}Su alegría da paso a una expresión pensativa.{/n} «Lo cierto es que mi clan y yo padecimos una gran penuria. No sabría explicar cómo es que sigo aquí, salvo por Su voluntad. ¿Cómo no iba a alegrarme saber que el mismo Emperador me salvó la vida?».

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特和善地笑了起来。{/n}“您的观察很确切，大人。众所周知，神职人员必须保持严肃，这样才能激起信徒的恐惧与敬畏。”{n}他欢快的表情消失了，取而代之的是沉思的庄严。{/n}“事实上， 我和我的氏族曾经历过巨大的苦难。若不是出于帝皇的意愿，我现在恐怕根本没办法站在您面前。既然帝皇亲自拯救了我们，那我怎么可能不开心呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert laughs good-naturedly.{/n} "A fair observation. Everyone knows that the clergy must maintain a stern appearance to inspire fear and awe in their flock." {n}His mirth fades, giving way to a pensive gravitas.{/n} "The truth is that my clan and I experienced great hardship. I cannot explain how it is I am standing before you now except by His will. How could one be anything but joyful knowing they were saved by the Emperor?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特和善地笑了起来。{/n}“您的观察很确切，大人。众所周知，神职人员必须保持严肃，这样才能激起信徒的恐惧与敬畏。”{n}他欢快的表情消失了，取而代之的是沉思的庄严。{/n}“事实上， 我和我的氏族曾经历过巨大的苦难。若不是出于帝皇的意愿，我现在恐怕根本没办法站在您面前。既然帝皇亲自拯救了我们，那我怎么可能不开心呢？”

languages.text: {n}アダルバートは穏やかに笑った。{/n}「よい観察だ。聖職者は、その群れに恐怖と畏敬の念を抱かせるために、厳格な外見を保たなければならないことは、誰もが知っているでしょう」{n}彼の笑いは消え、物思いにふけるような重々しさへと変わっていく。{/n}「真実は、私と私の一族は大きな苦難を経験したということです。私が今こうして皆さんの前に立っているのは、皇帝の御心によるものとしか説明ができません。皇帝に救われたことを知り、喜びを抱くのは当然でしょう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert laughs good-naturedly.{/n} "A fair observation. Everyone knows that the clergy must maintain a stern appearance to inspire fear and awe in their flock." {n}His mirth fades, giving way to a pensive gravitas.{/n} "The truth is that my clan and I experienced great hardship. I cannot explain how it is I am standing before you now except by His will. How could one be anything but joyful knowing they were saved by the Emperor?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アダルバートは穏やかに笑った。{/n}「よい観察だ。聖職者は、その群れに恐怖と畏敬の念を抱かせるために、厳格な外見を保たなければならないことは、誰もが知っているでしょう」{n}彼の笑いは消え、物思いにふけるような重々しさへと変わっていく。{/n}「真実は、私と私の一族は大きな苦難を経験したということです。私が今こうして皆さんの前に立っているのは、皇帝の御心によるものとしか説明ができません。皇帝に救われたことを知り、喜びを抱くのは当然でしょう？」

languages.text: {n}Adalbert lacht gutmütig.{/n} "Eine zutreffende Beobachtung. Jeder weiß, dass der Klerus streng erscheinen muss, um Angst und Ehrfurcht in seiner Gemeinde zu inspirieren." {n}Der leichte Ton weicht einer gesetzten Nachdenklichkeit.{/n} "Die Wahrheit ist, dass mein Clan und ich große Mühsal erlebt haben. Ich weiß die Tatsache, dass ich nun vor Euch stehe, nicht anders zu erklären als durch seinen Willen. Wie kann man etwas anderes als Freude empfinden, wenn man weiß, man wurde vom Imperator errettet?"
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert laughs good-naturedly.{/n} "A fair observation. Everyone knows that the clergy must maintain a stern appearance to inspire fear and awe in their flock." {n}His mirth fades, giving way to a pensive gravitas.{/n} "The truth is that my clan and I experienced great hardship. I cannot explain how it is I am standing before you now except by His will. How could one be anything but joyful knowing they were saved by the Emperor?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert lacht gutmütig.{/n} "Eine zutreffende Beobachtung. Jeder weiß, dass der Klerus streng erscheinen muss, um Angst und Ehrfurcht in seiner Gemeinde zu inspirieren." {n}Der leichte Ton weicht einer gesetzten Nachdenklichkeit.{/n} "Die Wahrheit ist, dass mein Clan und ich große Mühsal erlebt haben. Ich weiß die Tatsache, dass ich nun vor Euch stehe, nicht anders zu erklären als durch seinen Willen. Wie kann man etwas anderes als Freude empfinden, wenn man weiß, man wurde vom Imperator errettet?"

languages.text: {n}Adalbert babacan bir tavırla gülüyor.{/n} "Makul bir gözlem. Din görevlilerinin katı bir görünüşe sahip olması, bu sayede de cemaatlerinde korku ve hayranlık uyandırması gerektiğini herkes bilir." {n}Neşesi yerini düşünceli bir ciddiyete bırakıyor.{/n} "Doğrusunu isterseniz klanım ve ben büyük zorluklar çektik. Şu an burada karşınızda nasıl bulunduğumu açıklamayı başaramam ve yalnızca O'nun iradesi diyebilirim. İmparator tarafından kurtarıldığını bilen bir kişi neşe saçmaz da ne yapar?"
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert laughs good-naturedly.{/n} "A fair observation. Everyone knows that the clergy must maintain a stern appearance to inspire fear and awe in their flock." {n}His mirth fades, giving way to a pensive gravitas.{/n} "The truth is that my clan and I experienced great hardship. I cannot explain how it is I am standing before you now except by His will. How could one be anything but joyful knowing they were saved by the Emperor?"
